669730.name: Mind Trap
669730.description:
This little experimental game invites you to get new game experience. The aim of the game is to understand its aim. To achieve it you must explore the game world, and every part of it reflects metaphysical conscience and asks player – “Why do people lie”

Features

  • Technogenic design
  • Open little world
  • Player searches the aim himself
  • No saving

Controls

  • WASD - movement
  • Space - jump
  • LMB - drag/drop tables and chairs
  • Esc - lose focus in Web version (permanent quit in standalone version)
